txt.en: Campanula Chubb would like to thank you for your participation in the Farmers Faire Festival today.

'I hope you are having fun at the Festival!

'It seems you're having a swell time, so perhaps you'll enjoy one of these rewards. Here you are!'

'Come back tomorrow and I shall have more rewards for you!'
Campanula Chubb is excited to welcome visitors to the Party Tree and encourages them to partake in all of the festival's activities.

'Welcome, my friend, to the Farmers Faire!

'Get out there and participate, and there might just be a reward in store for you!

'Oh, and remember to keep cool! Nothing ruins the fun faster than heat blisters!'
Every day there is something to do for the Farmers Faire Festival. Come and join everyone in celebrating another lovely year and participate in the many Festival activities!
